title: The Monster War
description: “I woke up remembering how I’d had to fight the monsters in 1997, which of course I had never done.”First there was bigfoot. Then the ice monsters. By the time the aliens invaded in March, JT and Steve were pretty sure something weird was going on.That was just the beginning. Before the year was over they would face insect swarms, giant monsters, zombies, and the one thing that could destroy their friendship for good.A girl.
author: Bob Cram Jr.
